name: OnPlayerFinishedDownloading
notes: This callback is called every time a player changes virtual worlds, even if there are no custom models present in that world.
versions: This callback was added in SA-MP 0.3.DL  and will not work in earlier versions!
description: This callback is called when a player finishes downloading custom models. For more information on how to add custom models to your server, see the release thread and this tutorial.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player that finished downloading custom models.

params_body.name: virtualworld
params_body.description: The ID of the virtual world the player finished downloading custom models for.

return_values: This callback does not handle returns.
related_cb:
OnPlayerConnect: Called when a player connects to the server.
 OnPlayerDisconnect: Called when a player leaves the server.
 OnIncomingConnection: Called when a player is attempting to connect to the server.
